summary: Revision tracking app with manual completion workflow
architectural_notes: Revision completion requires explicit user action (manual review)
Missed revisions displayed in red until marked as reviewed
Review action available in both dashboard and calendar interfaces

existing_features.title: Add visual indicators in the calendar view to show missed revisions in red for dates where scheduled revisions were not marked as reviewed
Add 'Mark as Reviewed' action button in the TodayView dashboard that allows users to complete revisions for subtopics due on the selected date
Add 'Mark as Reviewed' action button in the SubTopicScheduleView calendar dialog that allows users to complete revisions when viewing a subtopic's schedule from the calendar
Ensure that when a missed revision is marked as reviewed after its scheduled date, it transitions from red (missed) to completed status in all views

new_feature_requests.summary: Manual revision completion: revisions marked completed only when manually reviewed, missed dates shown in red until reviewed
Mark as reviewed functionality in both dashboard and calendar views
Update the backend revision completion logic so that a revision is marked as completed only when explicitly marked as reviewed by the user, not automatically based on date passage

projectName: Implement manual revision completion workflow with missed revision indicators
